product_name: C.A.M.P. Orbit Wire Straight Gate Carabiner
long_description: Ideal for everything from trad to sport to ice, the lightweight, compact C.A.M.P. Orbit Wire Straight Gate Carabiner works well on the bolt end of a quickdraw, or you can use it to rack gear. Updated with a new nose and gate profile for superb clipping action. Smooth gate action offers just the right amount of resistance when clipping.
short_description: Ideal for everything from trad to sport to ice, the lightweight, compact C.A.M.P. Orbit Wire Straight Gate Carabiner works well on the bolt end of a quickdraw, or you can use it to rack gear.
